## IClientConfig.eventIngestionConfig property

Configuration settings for the event dispatcher

**Signature:**

```typescript
eventIngestionConfig?: {
        batchSize?: number;
        deliveryIntervalMs?: number;
        disabled?: boolean;
        maxQueueSize?: number;
        maxRetries?: number;
        maxRetryDelayMs?: number;
        retryIntervalMs?: number;
    };
```
